item.title: 辉瑞公司首席执行官表示，以非营利价格向低收入国家销售药品的计划进展缓慢
item.description: 辉瑞公司计划以非盈利的价格向世界上最贫穷的国家提供药品，该计划启动仅两年多，到目前为止签约的国家还不到计划目标国家的四分之一。【原文：Pfizer has so far signed up less than a quarter of the countries targeted under a plan to make its medicines available to the world’s poorest nations at not-for-profit prices, just over two years after it launched.】

item.title: 对冲基金流动 高盛称刺激政策助力中国对冲基金业绩增长
item.description: 高盛黄金经纪公司（Goldman Sachs）的一份报告显示，在中国央行推出自 2020 年中国禽流感疫情以来最大规模的刺激政策后，对冲基金本周交易中国股票的收益有所增加。【原文：Hedge funds trading China stocks saw gains this week after China's central bank unveiled its biggest stimulus since the 2020 COVID pandemic, a note from Goldman Sachs prime brokerage showed.】

item.title: 贸发会议负责人呼吁建立永久性主权债务重组制度
item.description: 联合国贸易和发展会议（United Nations Trade and Development agency）负责人告诉路透社记者，全球金融架构需要一个永久性的主权债务重组机制，因为目前的措施对债权人和借款人来说都是不够的。【原文：The global financial architecture needs a permanent mechanism for restructuring sovereign debt, as measures currently in place have fallen short for creditors and borrowers alike, the head of the U.N. Trade and Development agency told Reuters.】

item.title: 西南航空公司上调第三季度收入预期
item.description: 美国西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines）周四上调了第三季度每可用座位里程收入（RASM）的预期。【原文：Southwest Airlines on Thursday raised its third-quarter forecast for revenue per available seat miles (RASM), a proxy for pricing power.】

item.title: 壳牌、埃奎诺（Equinor）和道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）启用挪威二氧化碳封存设施
item.description: 壳牌（Shell）、埃奎诺（Equinor）和道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）周四表示，它们在挪威西海岸的二氧化碳（CO2）封存项目现已完工，可以接收二氧化碳，预计明年将首次交付。【原文：Shell , Equinor and TotalEnergies said on Thursday their carbon dioxide (CO2) storage project on Norway's west coast is now completed and ready to receive CO2, with its first deliveries expected next year.】

item.title: 埃森哲预测全年收入低于预期
item.description: 埃森哲公司周四预测的年收入低于华尔街的预期，因为企业支出的持续减少继续给专业服务行业带来压力。【原文：Accenture forecast annual revenue below Wall Street estimates on Thursday, as ongoing reductions in enterprise spending continue to weigh on the professional services sector.】

item.title: 耶伦呼吁开展更多金融稳定工作，实施周密监管
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）将呼吁继续努力确保金融体系的弹性，包括实施周到的监管，并回击那些希望降低银行资本要求的人。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen will call for continued work to ensure a resilient financial system, including pursuing thoughtful regulation and pushing back against those who want to roll back bank capital requirements.】

item.title: 早间交易美光再添科技新热潮，中国股市再度飙升
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 对电力的渴求让 ESG 投资者对科技股的钟情变得更加复杂
item.description: 投资者表示，管理着数千亿美元资金的投资者正在向微软、Alphabet 和其他公司施压，要求它们提供更多有关人工智能和先进计算所需动力的信息，以帮助决定该行业是否应继续在可持续基金中占很大比重。【原文：Investors who manage hundreds of billions of dollars are pressing Microsoft, Alphabet and others for more information on the power needed for artificial intelligence and advanced computing, to help decide whether the sector should stay heavily represented in sustainable funds, investors said.】

item.title: 纳斯达克指数引领华尔街期货走高，因美光预测后对人工智能持乐观态度
item.description: 美国股指期货周四上涨，原因是美光公司（Micron）发布乐观预测后，一股围绕人工智能的乐观情绪笼罩了华尔街，同时投资者还在等待经济数据和美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的讲话。【原文：U.S. stock index futures rose on Thursday, as a wave of optimism around artificial intelligence gripped Wall Street following Micron's upbeat forecast, while investors also awaited economic data and remarks from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，通用汽车公司将因刹车线问题召回超过 18,000 辆汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周四表示，通用汽车公司（General Motors）将因制动管路问题在美国召回18235辆商用车。【原文：General Motors will recall 18,235 commercial vehicles in the United States over an issue with brake lines, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家报道中国今年将发行 2,840 亿美元主权债务帮助振兴经济
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，作为新一轮财政刺激措施的一部分，中国计划今年发行价值约2万亿元人民币（约合2844.3亿美元）的特别主权债券。【原文：China plans to issue special sovereign bonds worth about 2 trillion yuan ($284.43 billion) this year as part of a fresh fiscal stimulus, said two sources with knowledge of the matter, adding to a string of measures to battle strong deflationary pressures and faltering economic growth.】

item.title: 中国银行需要注资以推动经济刺激措施
item.description: 分析师说，随着中国加大力度通过新的刺激措施稳定经济，中国的顶级银行需要尽早获得资本，以帮助它们增加贷款，从而重振岌岌可危的经济增长并控制资产质量紧张。【原文：As China steps up efforts to stabilise its economy with fresh stimulus, the country's top banks would need to be capitalised at the earliest to help them boost lending to revive faltering growth and manage asset quality strains, analysts said.】

item.title: 美国制裁许可证即将到期威胁俄罗斯人民币流动性
item.description: 从事进口和支付业务的消息人士告诉路透社，允许涉及俄罗斯金融基础设施支柱的交易的美国许可证即将到期，这可能会增加俄罗斯企业进行人民币交易的难度和成本。【原文：The impending expiry of a U.S. licence permitting transactions involving the pillars of Russia's financial infrastructure could make it harder and costlier for Russian businesses to deal in Chinese yuan, sources engaged in imports and payments told Reuters.】

item.title: 俄罗斯扩建波罗的海港口，瞄准新的谷物市场
item.description: 世界主要小麦出口国俄罗斯正在扩建波罗的海港口，其目标是到 2030 年将农产品出口量提高 50%，同时减少对传统黑海航线的依赖。【原文：Russia, the world's leading wheat exporter, is expanding its Baltic Sea ports as it aims to boost agricultural exports by 50% by 2030 while reducing dependence on traditional Black Sea routes, officials and executives said.】

item.title: 德国商业银行将于周五与意大利联合信贷银行举行首次会谈
item.description: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank）指定首席执行官贝蒂娜-奥洛普（Bettina Orlopp）周四表示，该行将于周五与意大利裕信银行（UniCredit）举行第一轮会谈，因为这家意大利贷款机构正力争达成合作。【原文：Commerzbank's designated CEO, Bettina Orlopp, said on Thursday that the bank will hold a first round of talks with UniCredit on Friday as the Italian lender presses for a possible tie-up.】

item.title: 扎克伯格表示，Meta 对 EssilorLuxottica 的投资只是 "象征性的"。
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司首席执行官马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）告诉科技新闻网站 The Verge，Meta Platforms 对眼镜制造商 EssilorLuxottica 的潜在投资将是巩固双方长期合作关系的一个 "象征性 "姿态。【原文：A prospective investment by Meta Platforms in eyeglasses maker EssilorLuxottica will be a "symbolic" gesture to cement their long-term partnership, CEO Mark Zuckerberg told technology news website The Verge.】

item.title: 瑞士联合银行今年第三次降息并表示将采取进一步行动
item.description: 瑞士国家银行周四将利率下调了 25 个基点，这是今年以来的第三次降息，与欧洲中央银行和美国联邦储备委员会采取的降低借贷成本的措施相呼应，并表示接下来可能会有更多的降息措施。【原文：The Swiss National Bank cut interest rates by 25 basis points on Thursday, its third such reduction this year, as it echoed steps to lower borrowing costs taken by the European Central Bank and U.S. Federal Reserve, and said more cuts could follow.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士：欧洲央行鸽派将推动 10 月降息，鹰派将坚持到底
item.description: 七名消息人士告诉路透社，在一连串弱于预期的经济数据公布后，欧洲央行的政策鸽派正准备争取下月降息，此举很可能遭到更保守的同行的抵制。【原文：Policy doves at the European Central Bank are preparing to fight for an interest rate cut next month after a string of weaker-than-expected economic data, a move likely to meet resistance from their more conservative peers, seven sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 中国希望通过灵活的定价方案与欧盟就电动汽车关税争端达成共识
item.description: 中国商务部周四表示，中国和欧盟委员会的技术团队正在就电动汽车关税争端的灵活价格承诺方案进行积极谈判。【原文：The Chinese commerce ministry said on Thursday that technical teams from China and the European Commission are actively negotiating a flexible price commitment solution over the electric vehicle tariff dispute.】

item.title: 黑客利用应用程序聊天机器人泄露数据后，印度 Star Health 公司起诉 Telegram
item.description: 路透社报道称，印度顶级保险公司 Star Health 已起诉 Telegram 和一名自称黑客的人，该黑客利用信息应用程序上的聊天机器人泄露保单持有人的个人数据和医疗报告。【原文：Top Indian insurer Star Health has sued Telegram and a self-styled hacker after Reuters reported that the hacker was using chatbots on the messaging app to leak personal data and medical reports of policy holders.】

item.title: 德国商业银行董事会确认独立战略，联合信贷银行寻求可能的合作
item.description: 在意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）施压要求合作之际，德国商业银行（Commerzbank）的监事会和管理委员会周四表示，已确认该行当前的独立战略。【原文：Commerzbank's supervisory and management boards have confirmed the bank's current strategy of independence, the lender said on Thursday, as Italy's UniCredit presses for a possible tie-up.】

item.title: 中国承诺 "必要支出 "以实现经济增长目标
item.description: 中国领导人周四承诺将部署 "必要的财政支出"，以实现今年约5%的经济增长目标，承认了新的问题，并提高了市场对本周宣布的新刺激措施的预期。【原文：Chinese leaders pledged on Thursday to deploy "necessary fiscal spending" to meet this year's economic growth target of roughly 5%, acknowledging new problems and raising market expectations for fresh stimulus on top of measures announced this week.】

item.title: 外国投资者为中国的刺激政策欢呼--从远处看
item.description: 随着市场对中国自大流行病以来最大规模刺激政策的欣喜情绪逐渐平息，外国投资者现在开始询问，这套价值 1 140 亿美元的工具包能否为疲软的股市带来扭转颓势所需的火花。【原文：As the market euphoria to China's biggest stimulus since the pandemic settles, foreign investors are now asking whether the $114 billion toolkit will provide the spark needed to turn around a beat-up stock market.】

item.title: 巴斯夫将 2025 年股息建议下调至每股至少 2.25 欧元
item.description: 作为新公司战略的一部分，德国化工巨头巴斯夫周四将其 2024 财年的股息建议下调至每股至少 2.25 欧元（2.51 美元）。【原文：German chemicals giant BASF on Thursday lowered its dividend proposal for the 2024 business year to at least 2.25 euros ($2.51) per share as part of its new corporate strategy.】

item.title: H&M 放弃 2024 年盈利率目标，第三季度利润下滑
item.description: 全球第二大上市时装零售商 H&M 周四表示，不再期望达到全年盈利率目标，同时公布的 6-8 月营业利润低于预期。【原文：H&M , the world's second-largest listed fashion retailer, said on Thursday it no longer expected to reach its full-year earnings margin goal, while reporting a lower-than-expected operating profit for the June-August period.】

item.title: 巴西航空公司寻求从中国商飞购买飞机
item.description: 巴西道达尔航空公司（Total Linhas Aereas）是一家小型货运和包机航空公司，它的目标是成为亚洲以外第一家向中国国有飞机制造商购买飞机的公司。【原文：Brazil's Total Linhas Aereas, a small cargo and charter airline, aims to become the first firm outside Asia to buy aircraft from China's state-owned planemaker, which is trying to break into a global passenger jet market dominated by Western manufacturers.】

item.title: 在全球范围内寻找中立者，以塑造世界财务成本
item.description: 随着主要央行现在一致降息，一场实时试验正在进行，以了解大流行病以来全球金融格局发生了多大变化，特别是宽松周期是否会因潜在利率上升而昙花一现。【原文：With key central banks now aligned in cutting interest rates a real-time experiment is underway in how much the global financial landscape has changed since the pandemic and in particular whether the easing cycle may be short-lived because of higher underlying rates.】

item.title: Stellantis 首席执行官走中国路线，避开电动汽车关税 "陷阱
item.description: 尽管首席执行官卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯（Carlos Tavares）抨击欧洲和美国的关税有反竞争之嫌，Stellantis 仍希望采用中国电动汽车制造商的低成本思维，但这家全球第四大汽车制造商要想取得成功，就必须避开大西洋两岸的贸易壁垒。【原文：Stellantis wants to adopt the low-cost mindset of Chinese EV makers despite the European and U.S. tariffs CEO Carlos Tavares lambasts as anticompetitive, but the world's No. 4 automaker must navigate trade barriers on both sides of the Atlantic if it wants to succeed.】

item.title: 华尔街反击纽约主权债务法案
item.description: 新兴市场主权债券的投资者对限制其债务重组选择的努力感到震惊，正在债券交易中增加条款，允许他们转换管辖区以避免此类限制。【原文：Investors in emerging market sovereign bonds, alarmed by efforts to limit their debt restructuring options, are adding clauses to bond deals that would allow them to switch jurisdictions to avoid such curbs.】
